version_description:
» Added a Carry Handle Option to the WM-AR4 (Under Optics)
» Fixed Moving Magazine Rounds Effect on AUS Gewehr A3
» Fixed a Bug Where Rounds Would Eject On Slide Locked Back
» Improved Cover and Firing Mechanics on the SWARM-249
» Bug Fixes an

» Completely Revised How Multi Device Linking Works
» Simply Select “Multi-Link Devices” in the Performance Settings Tab and Hit Save
» Link Between iOS Devices and Other Operating Systems
» Unlimited Amount of Devices Can Be Linked, Touch Any De

» Improved Flash Responsiveness
» Better Compatibility With Latest Devices
» New Guns to Try Out
